statements: UPDATE member_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE member_id = 12345;
UPDATE member_demographics SET gender = 'Female', class_preference = 'Yoga' WHERE member_id = 54321;
UPDATE member_demographics SET age = 30, class_preference = 'Yoga' WHERE member_id = 123;
UPDATE member_demographics SET location = 'New York', membership_type = 'Gold' WHERE member_id = 456;
UPDATE members SET age = 30 WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE class_preferences SET time_preference = 'Evening' WHERE member_id = 2;
UPDATE members SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE member_id = 101
UPDATE class_preferences SET preferred_class = 'Yoga', level = 'Intermediate' WHERE member_id = 101
UPDATE members SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE member_id = 101;
UPDATE classes SET instructor = 'Jane Smith', capacity = 25 WHERE class_id = 201;
UPDATE members SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET level = 'Advanced', interest = 'Yoga' WHERE member_id = 3 AND class_id = 2;
UPDATE members SET age = 30, last_name = 'Doe' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'New Value' WHERE preference_id = 2;
UPDATE members SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Female' WHERE member_id = 123;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'High Intensity' WHERE preference_type = 'Fitness' AND member_id IN (SELECT member_id FROM members WHERE age > 30);
UPDATE members SET age = 25, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE member_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE class_enrollment SET enrollment_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE enrollment_id = 1;
UPDATE members SET age = 30, email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE member_id = 123;
UPDATE classes SET duration_minutes = 90, instructor_id = 456 WHERE class_id = 789;
